info.name: HRMS Merge API Collection
info.description: Collection for HRMS Merge All Existing Data API endpoints with actual data records

item.name: Merge Operations

request.description: Triggers the comprehensive merge process and returns current status with actual data records. No authentication required. Returns immediately with real data samples.

response.name: Merge Status Retrieved
response.body:
{
    "statusCode": 200,
    "statusValue": "SUCCESS",
    "message": "Merge status retrieved successfully",
    "timestamp": "{{$timestamp}}",
    "data": {
        "summary": {
            "totalOutDutyRecords": {{$randomInt}},
            "totalAttendanceLogs": {{$randomInt}},
            "totalEmployees": {{$randomInt}},
            "existingMergedRecords": {{$randomInt}},
            "recordsToProcess": {{$randomInt}},
            "coveragePercentage": "{{$randomFloat}}%"
        },
        "actualData": {
            "outDutyRecords": [
                {
                    "_id": "{{$randomObjectId}}",
                    "employeeId": "{{$randomInt}}",
                    "AttendanceDate": "{{$isoTimestamp}}",
                    "location": "{{$randomLocation}}",
                    "InTime": "{{$randomTime}}",
                    "OutTime": "{{$randomTime}}",
                    "PunchRecords": "{{$randomTime}}:in(IN),{{$randomTime}}:out(OUT),",
                    "imageUrl": "",
                    "Status": "{{$randomWord}}",
                    "Duration": "{{$randomInt}}",
                    "createdAt": "{{$isoTimestamp}}",
                    "updatedAt": "{{$isoTimestamp}}",
                    "__v": 0
                }
            ],
            "mergedRecords": [
                {
                    "_id": "{{$randomObjectId}}",
                    "AttendanceDate": "{{$isoTimestamp}}",
                    "AttendanceLogId": {{$randomInt}},
                    "EmployeeId": {{$randomInt}},
                    "EmployeeName": "{{$randomFirstName}} {{$randomLastName}}",
                    "EmployeeCode": "{{$randomInt}}",
                    "InTime": "{{$randomTime}}",
                    "OutTime": "{{$randomTime}}",
                    "Duration": {{$randomInt}},
                    "Status": "{{$randomWord}}",
                    "DurationSource": "Office + Out Duty",
                    "PunchRecords": "{{$randomTime}}:in(IN),{{$randomTime}}:in(IN),{{$randomTime}}:out(OUT),{{$randomTime}}:in(IN),{{$randomTime}}:out(OUT), || OUT-DUTY: {{$randomTime}}:in(IN),",
                    "Location": "{{$randomLocation}}"
                }
            ],
            "employees": [
                {
                    "_id": "{{$randomObjectId}}",
                    "employeeId": "{{$randomInt}}",
                    "employeeName": "{{$randomFirstName}} {{$randomLastName}}",
                    "employeeCode": "{{$randomInt}}",
                    "designation": "{{$randomJobTitle}}",
                    "departmentId": "{{$randomWord}}",
                    "contactNo": "{{$randomPhoneNumber}}",
                    "email": "{{$randomEmail}}",
                    "work_outside": {{$randomBoolean}},
                    "role": "{{$randomWord}}"
                }
            ]
        },
        "logs": [
            "üìä MERGE STATUS SUMMARY",
            "üìà Total Out-Duty Records: {{$randomInt}}",
            "‚úÖ Already Merged Records: {{$randomInt}}",
            "‚è≥ Records to Process: {{$randomInt}}",
            "üéØ Current Coverage: {{$randomFloat}}%",
            "‚ö†Ô∏è Some records still need merging"
        ],
        "recommendation": "Run the full merge process to process remaining records"
    }
}

request.description: Retrieves comprehensive statistics and actual data records of the merge process including summary counts, date ranges, status breakdown, duration statistics, and real attendance/employee data.

response.name: Merge Results Retrieved

item.description: Endpoints for merging out-duty records with attendance logs and retrieving comprehensive data
